fields.summary: "no vpc" cloud cannot launch instances in scaling group

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

fields.description:
I created a launch configuration using the GUI.  I then created a scaling group also using the GUI.  After creating the scaling group, I noticed that instances were not being launched.  To experiment, I tried the same test but used the CLI instead.  The instance launched if I created the launch config using the CLI.  I also created a scaling group using launch config created from the CLI and it also worked.  Here is the output after attempting to launch the instance using the launch config from the GUI:
{code}
[root@h-07 ~]# euscale-describe-scaling-activities 
ACTIVITY        cc0ee354-c0bb-4a15-98d9-063c72487c5e    2014-12-19T01:52:36.193Z        scalegroup1     Failed  EC2-VPC not supported, for EC2-Classic do not specify subnet or network interface
ACTIVITY        a50ee36b-da4a-4253-a495-f737c1aedda5    2014-12-19T01:50:06.195Z        scalegroup1     Failed  EC2-VPC not supported, for EC2-Classic do not specify subnet or network interface
ACTIVITY        e86621ba-de33-498c-a07a-f88ee51ad41a    2014-12-19T01:48:46.178Z        scalegroup1     Failed  EC2-VPC not supported, for EC2-Classic do not specify subnet or network interface
ACTIVITY        7b1f5108-8ade-4506-bef9-eaa766292b2d    2014-12-19T01:48:06.179Z        scalegroup1     Failed  EC2-VPC not supported, for EC2-Classic do not specify subnet or network interface
ACTIVITY        3d30cd9d-a305-464a-ab46-c3dc2f7aacb5    2014-12-19T01:47:46.238Z        scalegroup1     Failed  EC2-VPC not supported, for EC2-Classic do not specify subnet or network interface
ACTIVITY        b3b8a37c-e703-4344-98db-759c9bef232b    2014-12-19T01:47:36.213Z        scalegroup1     Failed  EC2-VPC not supported, for EC2-Classic do not specify subnet or network interface
{code}

Log Data with GUI launch:
{code}
Thu Dec 18 17:59:05 2014  INFO [BackoffRunner:Eucalyptus.bootstrap:ListenerRegistry:listenerTasks.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#1086] Not running task 693902150656 UntrackedInstanceTermination
Thu Dec 18 18:00:05 2014  INFO [BackoffRunner:Eucalyptus.bootstrap:ListenerRegistry:listenerTasks.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#1058] Not running task 693902150656 UntrackedInstanceTermination
Thu Dec 18 18:01:05 2014  INFO [Exceptions:Eucalyptus.bootstrap:EphemeralConfiguration:arn:euca:bootstrap:::com.eucalyptus.util.async.AsyncRequests/.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#265] Component that caused exception is: DefaultJavaComponent{Tags.component}. Message payload is of type: DescribeTagsType
Thu Dec 18 18:01:05 2014  INFO [Exceptions:Eucalyptus.bootstrap:EphemeralConfiguration:arn:euca:bootstrap:::com.eucalyptus.util.async.AsyncRequests/.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#265] Failed to send message DescribeTagsType to service EucalyptusRequestQueueSync because: Component that caused exception is: DefaultJavaComponent{Tags.component}. Message payload is of type: DescribeTagsType
Thu Dec 18 18:01:05 2014  WARN [Contexts:ReplyQueue.115] Received a reply for absent client:  No channel to write response message: Found correlation id 7e59de68-41db-4af9-b0d9-172f1c5e105d but no corresponding context. for ExceptionResponseType
Thu Dec 18 18:01:46 2014  INFO [StaticDiskImages:Eucalyptus.bootstrap:EphemeralConfiguration:arn:euca:bootstrap:::com.eucalyptus.util.async.AsyncRequests/.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#258] Triggering caching: ubuntu00-ui/precise-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.img.manifest.xml
Thu Dec 18 18:01:46 2014  INFO [Exceptions:Eucalyptus.bootstrap:EphemeralConfiguration:arn:euca:bootstrap:::com.eucalyptus.util.async.AsyncRequests/.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#258] Component that caused exception is: DefaultJavaComponent{VmControl.component}. Message payload is of type: RunInstancesType

fields.summary: Launch config does not work if created using GUI.
